articles.author: Sam Meredith
articles.title: ECB stress test shows most euro zone banks don't include climate risk in their credit models - CNBC
articles.description: In a report published Friday, the European Central Bank said the findings reaffirm the view that banks must sharpen their focus on climate risk.
articles.content: The results of the European Central Bank's first climate risk stress test show that most euro zone banks do not sufficiently incorporate climate risk into their stress-testing frameworks and internal… [+3094 chars]

articles.title: Germany starts rationing energy as Putin's gas cuts bite - live updates - The Telegraph
articles.description: The euro may hit parity with the dollar within days as fears grow that Vladimir Putin could cut off gas supplies to Europe.
articles.content:
Good morning. 
Germany has begun an unofficial process of rationing energy amid rising fears Putin's gas cuts could lead to blackouts this winter.
